FuncDef:
The organization command configures a PKI entity's organization name.
The undo organization command deletes a PKI entity's organization name. The organization command configures a PKI entity's organization name. The undo organization command deletes a PKI entity's organization name. By default, a PKI entity does not have an organization name.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the organization name of the PKI entity.
It is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, including letters, numerals, apostrophes ('), equal signs (=), parentheses (), plus signs (+), commas (,), minus signs (-), periods (.), slashes (/), colons (:), and spaces.
